cells.data:
The ligation did not work for the ES2 construct so I basially repeated PCR5 with new reverse primer with a longer tail `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`.

## Samples

Primers: `Dbir_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`

1.)  D. birchii 
2.)  D. birchii 
3.)  D. birchii

Primers: `Dboc_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`
4.)  D. bocki
5.)  D. bocki
6.)  D. bocki

Primers: `Druf_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`
7.)  D. jambulina
8.)  D. jambulina
9.)  D. jambulina


## Program

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | 66         | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |

## Results

Failure...No bands

Run again on gradient.  The annealing temp is either too high or I made the PCR wrong. 

gleh.
